bs-visualeditorconnector-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:Version}} Special:Version], description of BlueSpice Visual Editor Connector extension.
bs-visualeditorconnector-enable-visualed: Label for preference to enable VisualEditor for BlueSpice extensions
bs-visualeditorconnector-cancel-edit: Label for visual editor tool to stop editing and go back to view mode
bs-visualeditor-nsm-label: Label for visual editor setting in namespace manager
bs-visualeditorconnector-inspector-tab-c: Label for inspector tab for commonly used parameters
bs-visualeditorconnector-inspector-tab-a: Label for inspector tab for advanced parameters
